titles.title: 021 God Our Father We Adore Thee

authors.author: George W. Frazer and Alfred S. Loizeaux

verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
God, our Father, we adore Thee
We Thy children, bless Thy Name
Chosen in the Christ before Thee
We are holy without blame

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
We adore Thee
We adore Thee
Abba's praises we proclaim
We adore Thee
We adore Thee
Abba's praises we proclaim

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
Son Eternal we adore Thee
Lamb upon the throne on high
Lamb of God we bow before Thee
Thou hast brought Thy people nigh

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
We adore Thee
We adore Thee
Son of God who came to die
We adore Thee
We adore Thee
Son of God who came to die

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines:
Father Son and Holy Spirit
Three in One
We give Thee praise
For the riches we inherit
heart and voice to Thee we raise

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines:
We adore Thee
We adore Thee
Thee we bless through endless days
We adore Thee
We adore Thee
Thee we bless through endless days
